title: Cybersecurity & Regulatory Governance
summary: Implementing 'Compliance-as-Code' to navigate the intersection of FERC/NERC reliability standards and emerging data privacy frameworks. Strategies for maintaining security integrity in mission-critical infrastructure.

title: Scaling Privacy in Regulated Utilities
summary: Lessons from the grid: Managing the tension between data transparency and stringent privacy compliance across complex, multi-entity holding companies.

title: The Macro-Economics of Decarbonization
summary: Evaluating how regional policy shifts and market incentives drive—or delay—the adoption of large-scale sustainable energy infrastructure.

title: Product Strategy for Legacy Migrations
summary: Moving the needle on technical debt: Navigating the complexities of cloud-based transformations within mission-critical utility billing engines.
